Hi, I'm Predrag Tasevski - Pece

Senior Cybersecurity and Privacy Expert, open‑source founder and enthusiast with 15+ years of experience across cyber defence, cloud security, and Governance, Risk, and Compliance. I’ve spent more than a few late nights breaking and fixing systems by design—and learning from every failure. I help organisations build strong cybersecurity culture and lasting security mindsets, and here I share what works, what doesn’t, and the real‑world lessons behind building secure, privacy‑first systems that actually hold up.

Learn more about me Read my posts →
“Cybersecurity is everyone’s responsibility.”
— Predrag Tasevski

In every organisation I work with, I help build and embed a strong cybersecurity culture that lasts — including a unique tagline that becomes part of the company’s identity such as “Cybersecurity is everyone’s responsibility”, “Keep calm — we make sure you are secure”, or similar mantras that stick in minds and daily practice. My focus is on empowering people, reducing human-factor risks, and turning teams into proactive defenders — because culture, awareness, and shared responsibility are the strongest defence any company can have.

Recent Posts

I write about practical cybersecurity and security culture, open‑source and tech experimentation, secure software practices and real‑world lessons learned from systems, projects, and community engagements.

What I Do

Services, expertise, and areas where I make a lasting impact

GRC & Compliance Services
Providing vCISO, vDPO, internal/external audits, and certification support for ISO/IEC 27001, 42001, GDPR, EU CRA, DORA, NIS2, NIST, PCI‑DSS, SOC2, MVSP and more.
Pentesting & Smart Contract Audit
Conducting penetration tests and in‑depth smart contract security audits to uncover risks and improve trust.
Web Development & Secure Implementation
Developing secure websites and platforms with Next.js, Hugo, 11ty, Docusaurus, Python, Drupal and related tooling — built with security and performance in mind.
Cloud Security Architecture
Designing robust cloud security architectures for modern enterprise environments that prioritize resilience, compliance, and scalable protection.
Policies, Process & GRC Implementation
Writing and implementing governance, risk and compliance policies, processes, and procedures tailored to your organisation.
SOC, Forensics & Incident Response
Cybersecurity SOC design, digital forensics, incident management, vulnerability and third‑party/vendor risk management.
Security & Privacy Training
Custom cybersecurity and privacy training programs and labs tailored to your organisation’s needs, strengthening awareness and human resilience.
Open Source & Digital Transformation
Helping organisations transition from vendor lock‑in to open‑source solutions, including Nextcloud Hub, CRM, ERP, chat, automation, analytics and security platforms.

Let's Connect

Whether you need guidance on building a strong cybersecurity culture, support with compliance and audits, help architecting secure systems, or crafting custom training and transformation strategies — I’m here to help. Drop me a message and let’s discuss how we can secure your organisation together.
